name: Transport Truck Driver Motorcycle Cargo Simulator 3D
name_original: Transport Truck Driver Motorcycle Cargo Simulator 3D
description:
Join the frenzy of motorbike driving and blaze through the city roads. This game combines the thrill of bike riding with the excitement of cargo transportation. Flaunt your heavy biking skills and shift gears like a professional trucker.

Get ready for an adventure ride as a superfast heavy biker and a cargo truck driver. Explore the city landscape on your motorcycle and go crazy on these highways. Load these bikes onto the trailer truck and drive it across the town to its parking destination.

Features:
• Epic cargo truck driving experience
. Extreme motorbike driving simulation
. 20 levels of various cargo transport missions
• Amazing 3D graphics and urban environment
• User friendly driving controls
